main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Bayonne, New Jersey on May 2, 1960, showing a reddish glow and then blacking out, with speeds estimated between 30 to 110 mph.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 60-90 seconds,Two witnesses were present but only one report card was received, The sighting's characteristics were compared to a meteor, but the duration was deemed excessive, The estimated speed was reported as 90-115 m.p.h., The object was described to have a circular or elliptical shape.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object exhibiting a reddish glow
witness description: One witness reported seeing the object while traveling back from Bayonne to Newark Airport, describing a bright light that seemed to hover for several minutes before moving rapidly.
